name: Attack Of The Pigy
description:
How to play

Pig is try to eat one of the farms and Farmer is try to kill the pig or harvest the farms after 160 seconds

Farmer has a rifle and 3 ammo that can one shot the pig but pig can dodge this bullets. Farmer can hold down Ranged Attack Button to fire his rifle.

Pig can get into the mud to avoid being shot or try to dodge by pressing dodge button. Pig can ping his position if it gets lost in the mud.

Pig can hold down Eat Button to Eat crops. Farmer can hold down Harvest Button to Harvest crops after 160 seconds.

Controls

Left Keyboard - Right Keyboard - Gamepad (Xbox)

  Wasd  - Arrow Keys - Left Analog -> Movement

  Space - Keypad 2   - A           -> Jump - Harvest(Farmer) or Eat(Pig) on Farm

  E     - Keypad 1   - X           -> Melee Attack(Farmer) or Dodge(Pig)

  C     - Keypad 3   - B           -> Ranged Attack(Farmer) or Ping your position(Pig)
